data.eml:eml: Two species and a genus new for Thailand, with description of a new species of Neurolarthra Fischer (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Alysiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yao, Junli, Achterberg, Cornelis Van, Sharkey, Michael J., Chapman, Eric G., Chen, Jiahua (2018): Two species and a genus new for Thailand, with description of a new species of Neurolarthra Fischer (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Alysiinae). Zootaxa 4438 (3): 551-560, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4438.3.7
